text: Isaac Toast (), is a toast (toasted sandwich) chain based in South Korea. As of 2016, the chain has over 700 retail stores in South Korea. It has further expanded internationally and established branches including Macau, Taiwan and Singapore. It is named after Isaac, the Hebrew patriarch of Genesis. ==References== ==External links== * Category:South Korean brands Category:Fast-food chains of South Korea Category:Toast dishes
title: Isaac Toast
